txt.en: 'You return! Tell me all about it! Were they angry?'\n\nShe laughs with delight as you recount your deeds, then presses coins into your hands.
Melia has asked you to destroy caches of Orc weapons in Tharbad.\n\nTharbad is in southern Cardolan.
You should let Melia know that you have enacted her revenge upon the Orcs.\n\nMelia is at Stonecrop Encampment, north-east of Tharbad.
The Orcs occupying Tharbad have been attacking travellers and destroying or stealing their goods. Turn around is fair play, as they say.

'I am so angry that our trip to Tharbad has been ruined by those awful Orcs! I wish I could walk right into their camps and destroy things of theirs, just like they did to us a few nights ago! But I am no match for them, alas.\n\n'You, however, could enact my revenge, could you not? If you come across any of their stashes of weapons, destroy them! Hahah! That will teach them!'
